mutants.code:
def check_balanced_halves(s: str) -> bool:
    n = len(s)
    if n % 2 != 0:
        s1 = s[:n // 2]
        s2 = s[n // 2:]
    else:
        s1 = s[:n // 2]
        s2 = s[n // 2 + 1:]
    s1 = sorted(s1)
    s2 = sorted(s2)
    return s1 == s2

def check_balanced_halves(s: str) -> bool:
    n = len(s)

        s2 = s[n // 2 + 1:]
    s1 = sorted(s1)
    s2 = sorted(s2)
    return s1 != s2
